options.content:
EP5G Unit Temperature Level, measured in 300s periods

Values mean the following:  
     0 - Temperature too low, Service unavailable  
     1 - Temperature very low  
     2 - Temperature low  
     3 - Temperature OK, slightly low  
     4 - Temperature OK  
     5 - Temperature OK, slightly high  
     6 - Temperature high  
     7 - Temperature very high  
     8 - Temperature too high, Service unavailable  
     9 - Temperature too high, Service unavailable  
     Unit temperature level lower than 1 or higher than 7 is an  
     indication that alarm Critical Temperature Taken Out of Service  
     is imminent.  
     [0]: Average unit temperature level 0 to 299 seconds of ROP.  
     [1]: Average unit temperature level 300 to 599 seconds of ROP.  
     [2]: Average unit temperature level 600 to 899 seconds of ROP.  

Condition: Measurement with integration time 300sec.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ep5gpm")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "expeca_ep5g_pm" and r.measName == "pmUnitTemperatureLevel")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pmUnitTemperatureLevel"})
  |> group(columns: ["index"])  // Group by index
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.index }))  // Set the series name to index
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "ep5gpm")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "expeca_ep5g_pm" and r.measName == "pmUnitTemperatureLevel")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pmUnitTemperatureLevel"})
  |> group(columns: ["index"])  // Group by index
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.index }))  // Set the series name to index
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "ep5gpm")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "expeca_ep5g_pm" and r.measName == "pmSfpTemperature")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pmSfpTemperature"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with pmSfpTemperature: (float(v: r.pmSfpTemperature) - 1000.0) / 10.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["measObjLdn"])  // Group by measObjLdn
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.measObjLdn }))  // Set the series name to measObjLdn
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "ep5gpm")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "expeca_ep5g_pm" and r.measName == "pmSfpTemperature")
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pmSfpTemperature"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with pmSfpTemperature: (float(v: r.pmSfpTemperature) - 1000.0) / 10.0 }))
  |> group(columns: ["measObjLdn"])  // Group by measObjLdn
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _field: r.measObjLdn }))  // Set the series name to measObjLdn
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

from(bucket: "ep5gpm")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "expeca_ep5g_pm" and r.measName == "pmPowerConsumption")
  |> group(columns: ["measObjLdn"]) // Group by the column 'measObjLdn'
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: mean, column: "_value", createEmpty: false) // Use mean instead of sum
  |> group(columns: ["index"]) // Group by the column 'index'
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1ns, fn: sum, column: "_value", createEmpty: false) // Use mean instead of sum
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "pmPowerConsumption"})
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop"])

title: ExPECA Dashboard
